name: Down in the Abyss
description:
Hey there little Wizard, do you remember the pact you had with the devil? He said he would make you immortal but he didn't said he wouldn't take your souls !

You are stuck in the infinite abyss and it seems that you need to escape to get your freedom again! Why are you still reading! Go!

**Phone users need to toggle the touchscreen in the option menu**

Files got corrupted when I had my new PC. If it gets a lot of positive review or a bit of money I would probably make a COMPLETE remake. Hope you still like this version :  -FlipFlop

Main theme & and Menu theme by :

Curruff

https://curruff.newgrounds.com/

https://soundcloud.com/curruff
